谷歌发现 Android 内存安全缺陷在 5 年内下降了 68% https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/google-sees-68-percent-drop-in-android-memory-safety-flaws-over-5-years/ Wed, 25 Sep 2024 13:00:00 -0400比尔·图拉斯SecurityGoogle https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/google-sees-68-percent-drop-in-android-memory-safety-flaws-over-5-years/ The percentage of Android vulnerabilities caused by memory safety issues has dropped from 76% in 2019 to only 24% in 2024, representing a massive decrease of over 68% in five years.
